p: After pistachio, walnut is the most important nut crop in Iran. In recent years, the country has experienced a rise in demand for newly established, modern walnut orchards by fruit growers. Due to the effects of climate change on suitable lands for walnut cultivation, this study was conducted to determine land suitability for walnut cultivation using GIS. Two temporal spans were considered in this research: the present-day conditions of walnut cultivation and the future of cultivation (2020â€“2049) as affected by simulations of climate change and the speculations thereof.
